contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of December 2013, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the decision of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the matter is REMANDED to the Court of Common Pleas of Pike County to conduct a new forfeiture hearing in accordance with Commonwealth v. Hann, 622 Pa. 636, 81 A.3d 57, 2013 WL 5827034 (2013).
The Application to File Supplement to Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
